titleStmt.title: The deceived virgin, or, The treacherous young lovers cruelty being a new song sung at Windsor / by E.G.
titleStmt.author: E. G.

notesStmt.note: "To the tune of Celia my foe."
First line reads: "Come hither all you who to love never knew."
Reproduction of the original in the Chetham's Library.
